member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.Testing.HtmlTestEncoder
member.summary: used for unit testing. This encoder does not perform any encoding and should not be used in application code.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.Testing.HtmlTestEncoder.Encode(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes characters from an array and writes them to a object.
member.param: The stream to which to write the encoded text.
The array of characters to encode.
The array index of the first character to encode.
The number of characters in the array to encode.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.Testing.HtmlTestEncoder.Encode(System.IO.TextWriter,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes a substring and writes it to a object.
member.param: The stream to which to write the encoded text.
The string whose substring is to be encoded.
The index where the substring starts.
The number of characters in the substring.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.Testing.HtmlTestEncoder.Encode(System.String)
member.summary: Encodes the supplied string and returns the encoded text as a new string.
member.param: The string to encode.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.Testing.HtmlTestEncoder.FindFirstCharacterToEncode(System.Char*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds the index of the first character to encode.
member.param: The text buffer to search.
The number of characters in text.
member.returns: The index of the first character to encode.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.Testing.HtmlTestEncoder.TryEncodeUnicodeScalar(System.Int32,System.Char*,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Encodes a Unicode scalar value and writes it to a buffer.
member.param: A Unicode scalar value.
A pointer to the buffer to which to write the encoded text.
The length of the destination buffer in characters.
When the method returns, indicates the number of characters written to the buffer.
member.returns: false if bufferLength is too small to fit the encoded text; otherwise, returns true.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.Testing.HtmlTestEncoder.WillEncode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines if a given Unicode scalar value will be encoded.
member.param: A Unicode scalar value.
member.returns: true if the unicodeScalar value will be encoded by this encoder; otherwise, returns false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.Testing.HtmlTestEncoder.MaxOutputCharactersPerInputCharacter
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of characters that this encoder can generate for each input code point.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.WebEncoders.WebEncoderOptions
